includedAssets.title: The Man Who Saved Central City
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep1 - The Man Who Saved Central City
includedAssets.synopsis: The fastest man alive returns. As a guilt-ridden Barry vows to defend the city, metahuman Atom Smasher threatens an attack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The fastest man alive returns. As a guilt-ridden Barry vows to defend the city, metahuman Atom Smasher threatens an attack.

includedAssets.title: Flash Of Two Worlds
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep2 - Flash Of Two Worlds
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry and the team have a difficult decision to make when a stranger from Earth-2 shows up with an urgent warning about an evil speedster.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Barry and the team have a difficult decision to make when a stranger from Earth-2 shows up with an urgent warning about an evil speedster.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Barry and the team have a difficult decision to make when a stranger from Earth-2 shows up with an urgent warning about an evil speedster.

includedAssets.title: Family Of Rogues
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry and the team discover that Captain Cold has been kidnapped. Plus, Joe is faced with a difficult decision. Wentworth Miller guest stars.

includedAssets.title: The Fury of Firestorm
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep4 - The Fury of Firestorm
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry and the team desperately search for another Firestorm match for Dr Stein. Plus, Barry and Patty grow closer.

includedAssets.title: The Darkness And The Light
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep5 - The Darkness And The Light
includedAssets.synopsis: The Flash is in for a shock when Dr Light comes through the portal. She also brings some alarming news concerning Zoom.

includedAssets.title: Enter Zoom
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry decides the time has come for him to face up to speed demon Zoom. But as he concocts a perilous plan, it appears not everyone has faith in him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Barry decides the time has come for him to face up to speed demon Zoom. But as he concocts a perilous plan, it appears not everyone has faith in him.

includedAssets.title: Gorilla Warfare
includedAssets.synopsis: Gorilla Grodd claims a victim when he returns to Central City. Patty begins to suspect that Barry might be hiding something from her.

includedAssets.title: Legends Of Today
includedAssets.synopsis: When immortal evil-doer Vandal Savage sets his sights on Kendra Saunders, Barry heads to Star City to ask Oliver (AKA Arrow) for help.

includedAssets.title: Running To Stand Still
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep9 - Running To Stand Still
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry musts fight for the city when The Weather Wizard tries to break Captain Cold and The Trickster out of Iron Heights at Christmas.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Barry musts fight for the city when The Weather Wizard tries to break Captain Cold and The Trickster out of Iron Heights at Christmas.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Barry musts fight for the city when The Weather Wizard tries to break Captain Cold and The Trickster out of Iron Heights at Christmas.

includedAssets.title: Potential Energy
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry wonders whether to tell Patty about his double life and Joe and Iris try to bond with Wally. Meanwhile, an evil thief shows up in town.

includedAssets.title: The Reverse-Flash Returns
includedAssets.synopsis: Danger looms as Cisco's vibe powers detect the return of one of Barry's most important villains, power-hungry madman Eobard Thawne.

includedAssets.title: Fast Lane
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry and Wells's search for a way to close the breaches gets sidelined when a meta-human named Tar Pit shows up. Iris risks her life to help Wally.

includedAssets.title: Welcome to Earth-2
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry, Cisco and Wells make a dangerous attempt to rescue Jesse from Zoom's lair. Barry gets a shock when he meets Earth-2's Iris and Joe.

includedAssets.title: Escape from Earth-2
includedAssets.synopsis: The team are forced to ask for help as they desperately search for Zoom's lair. Back on Earth-1, Caitlin rushes to perfect Velocity-9.

includedAssets.title: King Shark
includedAssets.synopsis: As the team struggles to deal with the consequences of their Earth-2 rescue mission, Arrow's Diggle and Lila show up with a dire warning.

includedAssets.synopsis: Barry runs into a fellow speedster who is up to no good. Meanwhile, sparks begin to fly between Iris and her new boss.

includedAssets.synopsis: Having discovered Zoom's true identity, Barry is more determined than ever to stop his arch-enemy.

includedAssets.title: Versus Zoom
includedAssets.synopsis: Armed with the tachyon device and all set to face Zoom, Barry believes he is fast enough to stop his enemy and orders the breaches to be opened.

includedAssets.title: Back to Normal
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry turns to Jesse for help when super-strong meta-human Griffin Grey kidnaps Harry. Plus, Wally corners Joe about The Flash.

includedAssets.synopsis: DC Comics' character Rupture comes to Central City with Zoom, who is intent on taking over by any means necessary.

includedAssets.title: The Runaway Dinosaur

includedAssets.title: The Race of His Life
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep23 - The Race of His Life

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Grant Gustin returns as the scarlet speedster in this pulsating second season of the hit DC Comics adaptation. The Flash learns the full power of the speed force, but must risk everything to save his world and others.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Grant Gustin is the scarlet speedster in a pulsating second season. The Flash must use the full power of the speed force to save his world and others.

includedIn.title: The Flash
includedIn.synopsis: After being struck by a bolt of lightning and doused in chemicals, Barry Allen gains the power to move at incredible speeds, becoming crime-fighting hero The Flash.
